examples.example: 我穿上心爱的球鞋，在球场上尽情地奔跑和挥洒汗水。

translate.english: I put on my beloved sneakers and run and sweat freely on the court.

examples.example: 我新买的球鞋十分合脚，让我运动起来更带劲了。

translate.english: The new sports shoes I bought fit my feet very well and make me more energetic when exercising.

examples.example: 我心爱的球鞋陪伴着我在运动场上尽情释放活力，享受每一次奔跑的快乐。

translate.english: My beloved sports shoes accompany me to fully release vitality on the sports field and enjoy the happiness of every run.
